payload.name: category-theory
payload.title: Category theory: compositional interfaces with identity + associativity
payload.formal: morphisms compose; identities exist; compositionality reduces complexity.
payload.apm2_mapping: holon interfaces should compose: work intake → episode execution → artifact emission → escalation. Tool invocations should also be composable pipelines with explicit handlers (74). The point is to build large systems from small verified pieces without “glue code entropy.”
